meanings.definition: A person who toils or works hard.
meanings.sent1: The moiler spent long hours in the fields, planting crops.
meanings.sent2: The dedicated moiler never shies away from a challenge.
meanings.sent3: The moiler's determination to succeed is truly inspiring.
meanings.sent4: In the world of hard work, the moiler shines like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The image of the moiler's unwavering perseverance stayed with me.

meanings.sent1: She would moiler away at her studies late into the night.
meanings.sent2: The workers moilered tirelessly to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The ants moilered together to build their tiny hill.
meanings.sent4: He moilered through the forest, determined to find his way out.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the hammer moilering against the metal echoed in the workshop.
